mapper.insert: insert into announcement (announcement_id, course_id, announcement_time, announcement_title, announcement_content) values (#{announcementId}, #{courseId}, #{announcementTime}, #{announcementTitle}, #{announcementContent})
mapper.select: select * from announcement where course_id = #{courseId} order by announcement_id DESC

select a.course_id as courseId, announcement_id as announcementId, announcement_time as announcementTime, announcement_content as announcementContent, announcement_title as announcementTitle, c.course_name as courseName, u.username as teacherName from announcement a, student_course su, course c, user u where su.student_id = #{userId} and su.course_id = a.course_id and c.course_id = a.course_id and u.user_id = c.teacher_id order by announcementId desc

select a.course_id as courseId, announcement_id as announcementId, announcement_time as announcementTime, announcement_content as announcementContent, announcement_title as announcementTitle, c.course_name as courseName, u.username as teacherName from announcement a, course c, user u where c.teacher_id = #{userId} and c.course_id = a.course_id and u.user_id = c.teacher_id order by announcementId desc
